text: Cyril Lawrence (12 June 1920 â€“ 14 April 2020) was an English professional footballer. He played as a winger. He played in the English football league for Rochdale and Wrexham. He was born in Salford, England. Lawrence died of COVID-19 on 14 April 2020 at Royal Bolton Hospital in Farnworth, Greater Manchester, during the 2020 coronavirus pandemic, aged 99. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom Category:People from Salford
title: Cyril Lawrence
